participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, always striving to spread joy through his art and music.
participant_1.background: I love making people happy with my music. I have a timeshare in Mexico. My favorite band is Iron Maiden. I am an artist from a small town in the Midwest. I'm always trying to find new ways to make our home feel more like our own.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and nurturing, she enjoys helping others and cherishes her family and experiences.
participant_2.background: I took a long break and reevaluated my priorities. Every day is a sweet taco-filled adventure. I have a little sister. My favorite singer is Jess Greenberg. I work as an English teacher.

content.text: What are you excited about?
I'm excited to start teaching again! I took a long break and reevaluated my priorities.
What is your favorite thing about your job?
It is really fulfilling to help students learn and grow.
That's great! It sounds like you have a good work ethic.
I try! I always say, work hard, play hard.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to concerts and listen to music. My favorite singer is Jess Greenberg.
Nice! I love music too. I play guitar in a band.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will! I'm always looking for new hobbies.
What else do you like to do?
I love to go to the beach and spend time with my family. I have a little sister who is my best friend.
That's sweet! I'm close with my siblings too.
I'm sure we'd get along great.
I'm sure we would too! I'm always looking for new friends.
Me too! Let's hang out sometime!
Sounds good! I'll send you my number.
Great
